name: 方旭偉
objective:
本課程為培育學生創業與品牌智財管理能力的課程。課程規劃一系列主題講座，邀請不同領域的專家學者組成授課團隊，分享自己的創業與品牌智財管理經驗，著重培養學生的創業管理能力，品牌管理能力與智財管理能力。
The objective of this course is to develop the management abilities of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property for students. The curriculum is designed to include the special lectures given by the experts in various fields. The lecture will focus on the experience sharing and case studies.
schedule:
課程安排分為兩部分：
1. 邀請國內外產官學研專家專題中英文演講 (10-15場）
2. 學生主題式互動討論
The course is divided to two parts:
1. Chinese or English speech from invited speakers (10-15 speakers)
2. Theme based interactive discussion
scorePolicy:
1. 出席狀況（30%）
2. 平時成績與心得 （30%）
3. 期末評量 （40%）

1. Attendance (30%)
2.  Class performance and report (30%) 
3. Final period evaluation (40%)
